statements: SELECT document_id, document_name, document_type FROM pharmaceutical_compliance_documents;
SELECT document_name, document_type, document_status FROM pharmaceutical_compliance_documents ORDER BY document_name ASC;
SELECT document_owner, document_status FROM pharmaceutical_compliance_documents WHERE document_type = 'Policy';
SELECT document_name, document_date, document_location FROM pharmaceutical_compliance_documents ORDER BY document_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_compliance_documents WHERE document_version > 2;
SELECT document_id, document_name, document_date FROM pharmaceutical_compliance_documents WHERE document_status = 'Approved' ORDER BY document_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT document_id, document_name, document_owner FROM pharmaceutical_compliance_documents WHERE document_type = 'Policy' ORDER BY document_owner ASC
SELECT document_id, document_name, document_type, document_version FROM pharmaceutical_compliance_documents WHERE document_status IN ('Draft', 'Under Review')
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_compliance_documents WHERE document_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT document_id, document_name, document_location FROM pharmaceutical_compliance_documents WHERE document_owner LIKE '%Johnson%'
SELECT document_name, document_type FROM regulatory_documents;
SELECT document_name, document_type, document_status FROM regulatory_documents WHERE document_status = 'Approved';
SELECT document_name, document_type, document_status FROM regulatory_documents WHERE document_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT regulatory_agency, compliance_status FROM product_regulations;
SELECT regulation_name, compliance_status FROM product_regulations WHERE regulation_name LIKE '%Safety%';
SELECT document_name, document_type FROM regulatory_documents WHERE document_status = 'approved';
SELECT * FROM product_regulations WHERE compliance_status = 'pending' ORDER BY regulation_name ASC;
SELECT document_name, document_date FROM regulatory_documents WHERE document_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY document_date DESC;
SELECT regulation_name, regulatory_agency, compliance_status FROM product_regulations WHERE regulatory_agency LIKE '%FDA%' ORDER BY compliance_status DESC;

SELECT document_name, document_type, document_date FROM regulatory_documents JOIN product_regulations ON regulatory_documents.document_id = product_regulations.product_id WHERE regulatory_agency = 'FDA' ORDER BY document_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance_documents;
SELECT document_id, product_name FROM regulatory_compliance_documents ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT document_type, COUNT(*) FROM regulatory_compliance_documents GROUP BY document_type;
SELECT * FROM document_versions WHERE version_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT agency_name, country FROM regulatory_agencies ORDER BY country, agency_name;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance_documents;
SELECT document_id, product_name, document_owner FROM regulatory_compliance_documents ORDER BY document_owner DESC;
SELECT document_id, document_type, document_owner FROM regulatory_compliance_documents WHERE product_name = 'Product A';
SELECT * FROM document_versions WHERE version_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY version_date DESC;
SELECT agency_name, country FROM regulatory_agencies WHERE country = 'USA' ORDER BY agency_name;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_documents;
SELECT document_name, document_type, author_name FROM regulatory_documents ORDER BY upload_date DESC;

SELECT regulatory_agencies.agency_name, regulatory_agencies.country, product_information.product_name FROM regulatory_agencies JOIN product_information ON regulatory_agencies.agency_id = product_information.product_id;
SELECT product_name, manufacturer_name, manufacturing_date, expiration_date FROM product_information WHERE expiration_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT regulation_name, regulatory_body, compliance_deadline FROM product_regulations WHERE compliance_deadline < '2024-12-31';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_documents WHERE document_type = 'Guideline'
SELECT document_name, author_name, upload_date FROM regulatory_documents WHERE upload_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT document_id, document_name, author_name FROM regulatory_documents WHERE author_name LIKE 'John%'
SELECT * FROM product_information WHERE expiration_date < CURRENT_DATE
SELECT agency_name, country, contact_email FROM regulatory_agencies
SELECT * FROM regulatory_guidelines ORDER BY title ASC;
SELECT doc_id, title, category FROM regulatory_guidelines WHERE category='privacy';
SELECT task_description, completion_date FROM compliance_tasks WHERE completion_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT reg_id, reg_description FROM product_regulations WHERE product_id = 1001 ORDER BY reg_id DESC;
SELECT report_id, reviewer_id, report_date FROM compliance_reports WHERE reviewer_id IN (101, 102, 103);
SELECT title, category FROM regulatory_guidelines WHERE category = 'Safety' ORDER BY title DESC;
SELECT doc_id, doc_url, version FROM product_documents WHERE product_id = 123 ORDER BY version ASC;
SELECT task_description, completion_date FROM compliance_tasks WHERE completion_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY completion_date DESC;
SELECT reg_description FROM product_regulations WHERE product_id = 456;
SELECT * FROM compliance_reports WHERE reviewer_id = 789 ORDER BY report_date ASC;
